ReportQuery.From: VW_PR_FAMILIA_ATUAL f, VW_PR_USUARIO_ATUAL a, VW_PR_VIDA_ATUAL d
ReportQuery.FixedFilter: trim(f.BA3_CODINT) = trim(a.BA1_CODINT) AND trim(f.BA3_CODEMP) = trim(a.BA1_CODEMP) AND trim(f.BA3_MATRIC) = trim(a.BA1_MATRIC) AND trim(a.BA1_MATEMP) NOT LIKE ('99999%') AND trim(a.BA1_MATVID) = trim(d.BTS_MATVID)
ReportQuery.Filters:
ReportFilterQuery> regional f.BA3_YREGIO IN (:regional)
uf trim(a.BA1_ESTADO) IN (:uf)
parentesco replace(trim(a.BA1_GRAUPA), '00', '01') IN (:parentesco)
plano trim(f.BA3_CODPLA) IN (:plano)
deficiente ((trim(d.BTS_DEFFIS) IN ('1', 'S') and (:deficiente) = 'S') or (trim(d.BTS_DEFFIS) IN ('0', 'N', '') and (:deficiente) = 'N'))
estudante ((trim(d.BTS_UNIVER) IN ('1', 'S') and (:estudante) = 'S') or (trim(d.BTS_UNIVER) IN ('0', 'N', '') and (:estudante) = 'N'))
